about_the_game:
Ayla's Dollhouse is a harrowing adventure game about Ayla, a little girl who, due to her daily use of medical drugs and narcotics, finds herself bereft of the pleasures of childhood and the sobriety of a happy life.

Help Ayla in her desperate attempt to be normal. Explore everyday environments and experience the agonizing everyday situations of a dreamless girl's life. And who knows, you might be lucky enough to meet… Mr.Bubblegum.

Features

  • Gameplay: Visual Novel, Side-scrolling 2D and Point and Click.
  • Hand drawn by a single illustrator
  • A mysterious and engaging narrative about a psychologically tormented girl.
  • Interaction with the scenarios and characters.
  • Through Ayla's diary, discover her past traumas and anguish.
  • Sensitive and immersive dialogues.
  • Gallery system, containing game footage, and parts of the artistic development process.

Message from Developers

Hello, we, the developers of Ayla's Dollhouse (Thiago and Danilo), are extremely excited to introduce you to Ayla's universe, a story originally made with the aim of being just a written story, but which over time has been fostered along with our dream of developing an independent game.


The Ayla project was certainly one of the most difficult and challenging projects we decided to try. It was two years of a lot of learning and difficulties, in addition to countless unforeseen events... However, now that we finally have the opportunity to share our work with you, we can say that it was worth it.

We hope you have as much fun as we do with Ayla's Dollhouse!

name: Ayla's Dollhouse

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (X64) or higher
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-2328M CPU @ 2.20 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: We recommend using a 16:9 resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Ayla's Dollhouse is a psychological game that tells the unfortunate story of Ayla, a girl tormented by the disorder of time, and her own demons.
